title: Should LL get an AIM address?
content:
Since that little girl won't respond to her PM, I think she may notice a thread about it.

Who here thinks that LL should get an AOL Instant Messenging SN and program, located at '[url=http://www.aim.com'?]www.aim.com'?[/url]

I'll get you to do it one way or another, LL... =P~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
I've changed a lot since my last time on this forum...

title: Gaim?
content:
Why don't you just use Gaim (or some other multi-protocol chat client) and add her MSN address to your list if you're so desperate to chat? It'd also make you more likely to end up in some wacky conversations with all the other MSN Keeners if you add them to your list as well. Cave assectatorem Ductoris Alacris

A concerned member of the Preservation of Endangered Spleens Society

[url=http://jimsoft.spatang.com/]JimSoft Lair[/url]

title: Re: Gaim?
content:
A program that allows you to sign in to many different im's at once (AIM, MSN, IRC).
I have a question though: Is it possible to talk from one type (say, AIM) to another type (such as MSN). Or do i need an account for both?-Genius314
[url=http://planetck.spatang.com]PlanetCK[/url]

title: Re: Gaim?
content: Gaim can be downloaded at [url=http://gaim.sf.net]gaim.sf.net[/url], for those who don't know how to use Google.

title: Re: Gaim?
content:
There's also trillian, which I use for my Yahoo, AIM, and MSN.
